error-no-paintset: You need to have a painter's palette in your left hand
error-unexplored-map: You have to reveal this part with the map item before being able to place waypoints there.
error-unexplored-map-propick: Prospecting results are not saved, you have to reveal this part with the map item first.
itemdesc-map-precise-coal: A more accurate mapping method, more details, and simply more paper.
itemdesc-map-primitive-coal: A good starting tool for amateur cartographers.
itemdesc-paintbrush: Equip a painter's palette in your left hand to paint the map.
itemdesc-paintset-*: Use a paintbrush in your right hand to paint the map.
toolmode-map-scale: Scale 1:{0} ({p1:0.# blocks|# block|# blocks} per pixel)
toolmode-paintbrush-refresh: Refresh map state in {0}-chunk radius ({1} total)
toolmode-paintbrush-upgrade: Upgrade map color in {0}-chunk radius ({1} total)
